subject: Coccidioidomycosis (Valley Fever)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The intrusion of valley fever into the career of Conor Jackson now resides somewhere in the background of the struggles of the Mets’ Ike Davis, who has the disease but has not exhibited symptoms.
snippet: The intrusion of valley fever into the career of Conor Jackson now resides somewhere in the background of the struggles of the Mets’ Ike Davis, who has the disease but has not exhibited symptoms.
